scenario_text.value:
(After rescuing Miu at the amusement park,
we went back to the school for a bit.)

(From Jijimon, we learned that there might be
a way for us to get back to our world.)

(As for the way... We should ask an enemy out
there who knows more about what’s going on.)

(We have to be ready before we go asking
questions... So we’re all checking supplies.)
Have you found anything promising, Takuma?
Nothing worth mentioning. How about you?

Nothing over here, either. ...I’m hopeless,
aren’t I?

That’s not true, Aoi! You’re trying just as
hard as everybody else!
Thanks...

We haven’t found anything either, so don’t
sweat it!
Right, what Agumon said!
Oh hey, you guys’re here, too!

Yeah. We couldn’t find anything, though...
Any luck over there?

None at all, I’m afraid. You’d think a school
would have more useful stuff, huh?
I wonder how the others are doing.
They haven’t showed up yet... Oh!
Good morning, everyone...
Morning...
Uh, mornin’...

(Sounds like Shuuji had a nasty dream last
night. He must be pretty wiped out.)

Are you all right, Shuuji? You look a little
pale...

You were talking all funny in your sleep. You
have a nightmare or something?

Wha’! No, I, I’m fine...! I slept like
a baby, I swear!
Still, you’re not looking too good... Hmm?
I said I’m fine on my own!

We have no idea what’s going to happen!
I can’t leave you alone!
Enough already! Don’t come with me!
Hey! Miu!

Those two are the same as ever. Kinda puts
you at ease, doesn’t it?

Now’s not the time to sit back and relax. We
have to stop them from bickering...
WHAT in the WORLD are you DOING?!
Huh? Uhhh, Shuuji?

Hey, you two! Your constant fighting is
starting to annoy everyone!

Shut up. This is family business, so stay out
of it!

Calm down, guys! And Miu, don’t be so cruel
to your brother.
But I didn’t do anything wrong...

Those two get along in their own way, Shuuji.
Maybe you don’t need to be so harsh.

You say so, but... Anyway, stop arguing so
much over nothing!

Oh hey, the gang’s all here. Guess I’m
last...uh, did I miss something important?

No, it’s cool. Now that everyone’s here,
maybe we should see where we’re at?

Yes, good idea... Let me take the lead,
Takuma.
It’s all you.
Humans are kind of intense, huh.
If only all of them were as nice as Aoi.

Nothing to be done about it now. We can only
have faith and watch over them.
You sure about that...?

...In other words, nothing worth reporting.
This is bad, given the enemies out there.

Those things want to sacrifice us or
something?
I don’t get it...
Maybe that’s the one behind all of this?
What is this “caretaker” in the first place?

Probably, like, the king of all evil, right?
I bet we’d figure things out if we met him.

You mean meet the head bad guy? Are you outta
your mind?! That’s way too risky!

That means waltzing into the enemy’s hideout?
That’s not risky, that’s a death sentence!

She’s right...
The idea is pretty frightening.

What’re you saying? You act like we got
a choice!

We got no idea what’s going on—our enemies,
why we’re being attacked, even this world!

How’re we supposed to defend ourselves if
we’re in the dark here?!

We oughta kick their door down and get them
to spill everything they know!
Hmm... Well, you’re not wrong.
Yeah, I like it! Jump right to the last boss!
You’re gonna stay put, Miu.
What?! Whyyy?!
Because it’s dangerous, obviously!

And you don’t worry about us at all? Just
her. No wonder she feels coddled to death.
Ahaha...
Now, now, everyone just hold your horses!

I can’t let any of you just walk right into
the enemy base! It’s too dangerous!
Hoh boy, here we go again...

You have no need to fear a certain degree of
danger with us around, you know.
Yeah! I’ll protect Takuma!

We’ve been through our fair share of crazy
scrapes, after all.

Their numbers ain’t anything to worry about,
neither! Easy pickings!

True, true. It should be fine with all of
these guys around, right?

With their power, we shouldn’t have too much
trouble, I’d guess.

Dammit... That’s easy for you to say! Your
beasts are strong!
Why is mine the only one so useless...
I, I’m sorry...

Lopmon’s doing his best too, Shuuji. You
shouldn’t talk about him like that.

Anyway, I’m against this! There’s no need to
face such danger. There must be other ways!

This is our best option right now! Rush their
base, and get all the intel we need! Simple!

Man, Takuma, this is going nowhere. Why don’t
you try giving your two cents?

(Hmm. Should we head to the enemy base, or
look for another way...?)

(The first choice is definitely dangerous,
but it’d be nice to get some info.)

(The second means finding a safer way to
learn about this world... But how, exactly?)

(Each option has its pros and cons. I don’t
see my opinion tipping the scales, but...)
(Still, I think we should...)
Look for another way.
Enter the enemy base.
Think a bit more...

I’m with Shuuji and Saki. We should do all we
can to avoid putting ourselves in danger.
Uh...yes, my sentiments exactly.

Yo, you really think that chickenshit is
gonna fly here?
You know we’re here to protect you, right?

It’s not that I don’t trust you guys, Agumon.
I’m just prioritizing our safety.

The problem is, I can’t think of a safer way
to do this. Do you have any ideas, Shuuji?
Me? Um, well... Not exactly.

Pfft, all sizzle and no steak.
What a blowhard.
Hey, watch your mouth, Kaito!

In that case, the only way to learn about
this world is to seek out the enemy...

I’m with Minoru and Kaito. We should head for
the enemy’s base.
Right on the money. Am I right, or amirite?

But that means we’ll end up fighting, doesn’t
it? Isn’t there a more peaceful way...?

I know we run the risk of being attacked, but
we run the same risk by staying here.

Besides, we’re not going there to fight, just
talk. If things get dicey we can always run.

Indeed. If it comes to that, opening up an
escape route should be a trifle for us.

Ahh, I get it. Well if that’s the case, it
can’t be ALL that dangerous...right?

Right now, it’s hard to say if heading to
their base is the right move.
Whaaat, you’re just sitting on the fence?

I’m just saying. Even if we don’t go, we
don’t have any other backup plans, either.

That is true. Safety is key, but so is
learning more about this world.

When it comes down to it, the real issue is
how to search outside safely, isn’t it?

Yeah. Unfortunately, the only place we know
we can learn from is our worst enemy’s base.
If that’s true, then... Hmm...

Let’s just gooo already! Syakomon and the
others will take care of us, right?
Yeah, leave the hairy stuff to us!

So that’s it, then... You all are just going
to ignore me...

Is it because my beast is weak...? Because
I can’t fight...?

I...I must be strong. Always strong, always
correct. I must guide everyone...and yet...
Shu...Shuuji? Are you okay?
Quiet! This is all your fault!
Heeek! I’m sorry...

Anyway, we have enemies out there, so we have
to fight!

That means we have to work together! Only then
can we all get home safely!

Right, we do still have the chance we’ll find
a way back home.

I can’t stand the idea of being offered up
with no clue as to why.

I’m going to go look inside the school again!
All of you should consider your own plans!
Uh, wait! Heyyyyyy!
Didn’t we already say we didn’t find jack?

You should watch your tone. Shuuji is
performing his duties quite admirably.
Shuuji is trying his best.
Unlike me...

You’re doing your best too, Aoi! Have more
confidence in yourself!
...Thanks.
Hey, Takuma. What’re we gonna do?

Our search takes priority, but maybe I’ll
talk to everyone and get the bigger picture.
You do whatever you want, Agumon.
Okay!

(It’ll be nice if I can actually learn anything
new at all...)
